properties.areaDesc: Greater Lake Tahoe Area; Greater Lake Tahoe Area
properties.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued January 4 at 3:24AM PST until January 4 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Reno NV
properties.description:
* CHANGES...Increased wind speeds and wave heights for this
morning.

* WHAT...Southwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts to 45 mph this
morning then decreasing to 10 to 20 mph with gusts to 30 mph.
Waves 2 to 4 feet this morning then decreasing to 1 to 3 feet.
Highest waves from mid lake to the north and east shores.

* WHERE...Greater Lake Tahoe Area.

* WHEN...Until 4 PM PST this afternoon. The strongest winds and
roughest lake conditions are expected this morning.

* IMPACTS...Small boats, kayaks and paddle boards will be prone
to capsizing and should remain off lake waters until
conditions improve.
properties.instruction:
Lake conditions will be rough and hazardous today, especially
through the morning. Consider postponing boating activities on the
lake until a day with less wind.

NWSheadline: LAKE WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON FOR LAKE TAHOE
